CodeEditorModel.Text:
'IAG Code behind - Add local subroutines for the IAG.
''' <summary> ''' Toggle position of graph : ''' 0 = Full trace ''' 1..5 = Position 1 to 5 ''' 6 = Hide graph ''' </summary> Sub TogglePos
' Increment position If MyTrend.Cfg.Position < 6 Then MyTrend.Cfg.Position += 1 Else MyTrend.Cfg.Position = 0 End If
' Hide trace when position = 6 If MyTrend.Cfg.Position = 6 Then MyTrend.View.Hide = True Else MyTrend.View.Hide = False End If
End Sub
